content.rendered:
Overnight stay package during the Festival of Lights in Zagreb 15–19 March 2023

Renaissance Lights at the Esplanade

Experience an illuminated Zagreb like you have never seen before

Don’t miss out on one of the most popular and attractive festivals in Zagreb – the 2023 Festival of Lights. Bask in charming illuminated installations in as many as 28 locations – experience a combination of art, technology, and incredible animation that will enliven the city centre, and welcome spring at the magical Esplanade Hotel in Zagreb.

Book the ‘Renaissance Lights at the Esplanade’ package and start your stay with a sensational flaming Supernova Star cocktail at the art deco setting of the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar.

Explore beautiful Zagreb’s squares, parks, promenades, and buildings of the Upper and Lower Town illuminated by light art, and then enjoy one of the luxurious Esplanade rooms with an impressive view of the city. Say hello to those very first rays sunshine with a delicious breakfast in the intimacy of your room or head out to the elegant Zinfandel’s Restaurant and start your day with top delicacies from the à la carte menu, with the best coffee in town.

 

The package includes:

  • Overnight stay for two in the luxurious Superior Room
  • A welcome bottle of house wine and handmade chocolate pralines
  • Breakfast for two from the buffet table and à la carte menu in Zinfandel’s restaurant or in your room
  • Flaming Supernova Star cocktail for two at the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar
  • Early check-in/late check-out, depending on capacity and availability
  • Free superfast Wi-Fi
  • Free access to the Health Club – fitness and saunas
  • Press Reader Hot Zone – download newspapers and magazines during your stay free of charge

Package price: 256 €

 

Please note:

  • The offer is subject to availability from 15 to 19 March 2023
  • At an additional charge, it is possible to upgrade your room category
  • VAT is included in the price of the package.
  • The price of the package is for two people in the Superior Room
  • Fixed conversion rate (€1 = HRK 7.53450)
  • Tourist tax in the amount of €1.60 per person per day is not included in the price
  • All other services that are not listed in the package are subject to additional charges and can be ordered in advance when booking the package

 

Round off your stay at the Esplanade

(all additional services will be extra charged according to price list or menu):

  • Facial and body massages and treatments are available at the Health Club Esplanade – prior appointment is required, treatments are charged according to the displayed price list
  • Limousine Service – price available on request
  • Afternoon tea for two at the Esplanade bar, selection of teas, snacks, and desserts on a tiered stand, 35.83 € (HRK 270) – prior table reservation required
  • Lunch or dinner at Zinfandel’s restaurant or at Le Bistro – à la carte offer, prior table reservation required
  • Esplanade štrukli at Le Bistro, portion 11.28 € (HRK 85) – prior table reservation required
  • Sunday Brunch at Zinfandel’s, 59.73 € (HRK 450) per person – with prior table reservation

 

 

Package reservations and additional information:

Phone: +385 (0)1 4566 666

reservations@esplanade.hr

 

Published: March 7th 2023

excerpt.rendered: Don’t miss out on one of the most popular and attractive festivals in Zagreb – the 2023 Festival of Lights
